data.name: About_Paragraph_1
data.value: My name is Lex Kartynnik , I am from Belarus, now I live in Poland and have been working in Tech since 2011.

data.name: About_Paragraph_2
data.value: I worked as a Software Engineer for the 10 years (backend, C#, .NET, Azure), and since 2021, I've been developing global tech community at aw.club. Some people call it Â«Developer RelationsÂ».

data.name: About_Paragraph_3
data.value: In parallel with my main job, I do a lot of tech, near-scientific and other technical content on YouTube under the pseudonym Lex ITBeard .

data.name: About_Paragraph_4
data.value: On this web site you gonna to learn a little bit more about all my projects ğŸ˜Š

data.name: Projects_Itbeard_Description
data.value:
The show Â«ĞĞ¹Ğ¢Ğ¸Ğ‘Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Â» ("ITBeard") tells about the life of tech specialists from inside and in its episodes tells about programming languages, popular technologies, professions, famous representatives of the sphere and even science.

data.name: Projects_BeardNews_Description
data.value:
Â«Beard NewsÂ» is a solocast where I talk about IT gossip, events in my life, new and old content, and upcoming plans.

The podcast is released once a month and is available to my patrons and sponsors.

data.name: Projects_Vkl_Description
data.value:
Â«VKL.worldÂ» is the first exclusively Belarusian-language community on the Mastadon network.

Mastadon is the distributed equivalent of Twitter, but without the dictatorship of Ilon Musk.

data.name: Projects_CiomnyLos_Description
data.value:
Â«Ğ¦Ñ‘Ğ¼Ğ½Ñ‹ Ğ›Ñ‘ÑÂ» ("ciomny los") is a talk podcast in Belarusian, in which Belarusians talk about their occupations and reflect on Belarusianness.

Each episode is a new profession or occupation: from scientists and programmers to musicians, comedians and even Tolkien fans!

data.name: Projects_Aia_Description
data.value:
Â«AIAÂ» is a podcast where we discuss with Vitya Shelenchenko the latest news from the world of neural networks and artificial intelligence.

The podcast is released with the support of Anywhere Club every two weeks.
